Description of incident: Beef O'Brady restaurants appear to have been a victim of a data breach to their point of sale system, when unauthorized credit card transactions begain appearing on financial statement of customers. These transactions were from numerous vendors in Texas, New York, and Massachusetts. The restaurant chain is located in Florida.Reportedly, a minimum of four Florida Beef O'Brady's  restaurant locations have been compromised.The information compromised included credit and  debit card information. The company is currently working with  local law enforcement to further investigate the breach. More Information: http://www.wtsp.com/story/news/local/2014/09/09/potential-data-breach-at...
